name: Patchwork Kingdom #639 | Ozabandalar
description: The twin kingdoms of Ozabandalar, separated by a digital divide. A bustling kingdom of 66 schools on top that are all connected to the internet, and 59 schools, not connected, hidden in the upside down kingdom | Created for Giga (GigaConnect.org) — connecting every school in the world — in celebration of UNICEF's 75th birthday, by Nadieh Bremer
